creator: RLive Apps
descriptionHtml:
RLive is the best radio app of 2020 in Israel
RLive allows listeners to instantly tune in to the top radio stations in Israel using just one app.
RLive (Radio Live) offers a simple and clean interface so you can listen to your favorite radio stations. All the stations are organized by genre so you can access the top radio FM stations in Israel and around the world, which no other app has done before! With RLive you don’t need another app.

Tune in to the best radio stations – using just one app. 💪💪

More reasons to download?
👍 An advanced, high-quality, stable media player to listen to the top radio stations
👍 An easy and simple interface, suitable for everyone
👍 Quick navigation between radio stations
👍 Listen to the top radio stations in Israel, like Galgalaz, Kan Bet, Kan 88, Galei Zahal, Radio Jerusalem, Radio Tel Aviv, Lelo Hafsaka, Radius 100FM, Radio Haifa and, and more of the best radio stations.

Personalized especially for you
🌍 Supported languages: Hebrew, English, French, Russian, and Arabic
📍 Location: easily and quickly find the top stations in your area
⌛ Sleep timer: set a time for the app to shut down before you go to sleep
❤ Favorites list: save the stations you like best for speedy access
🚗 Driving mode: simple and clean display to prevent dangerous use of the app while you drive
♿ Accessible app: set accessibility definitions to improve user experience, fitting people with disabilities, too
📺 Chromecast support: sync the broadcast to all Google devices and Smart TVs
🔎 Quick and easy search: supports voice search

If you want to listen to radio FM, this is the best radio app for you. In a single app, you can listen to radio stations in the top genres - national radio, regional radio, radio by different styles, Mizrahi-Greek radio, and more, all for easy, quick and user-friendly access.

❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
The app is constantly being updated and we welcome every suggestion and feedback from our community of users. We are dedicated to creating high-quality user experience to make this the best radio app for our users.
❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

Up-to-Date
RLive radio is the official app for RLive.co.il, a website that transformed the way many Israelis listen to the radio and to podcasts.
The website and the app are constantly being updated to adapt to any change and innovation in the available radio stations and podcasts. The people behind this project are working hard to add relevant content in real-time and to make sure the content you receive is the most current, rich and relevant.

Feedback? Compliments? Questions?
The RLive team is dedicated to creating the very best user experience for every single listener. This is why we welcome every note, suggestion, or idea to help improve the app.
Would you like to share your views with us? We would love to keep in touch through:
The Contact Us page on the website: www.RLive.co.il
Our official Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/RLiveApp
Support e-mail:📩 app@rlive.co.il

👏 👏👏Did you like the app? Remember to share your positive reviews with everyone, and invite family and friends to participate in RLive’s new and advanced listening experience.
